title: Asylum Session (The Asylum Session)
synopsis: The story takes place in the far future, when the civilization has declined. Hiyoko is a high school girl, who aims to enter an art university. She runs away from her home because her father tried to throw away her mother's keepsake drawings. She finds a slum located in a stadium and meets the leader of the street children, Akira.
voices: ['Kaneko, Harii', 'Aihashi, Aiko', 'Iwasaki, Masami', 'Hasu, Takehiro', 'Kanada, Aki', 'Maeda, Takeshi', 'Shimozaki, Hiroshi', 'Kousaka, Atsushi', 'Nemoto, Masakazu', 'Matsuyama, Takashi']
